message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

This paper deals with the problem of inverse rendering, which involves recovering 3D properties of a scene from 2D input images. This is a problem that is commonly studied in computer vision (cs.CV) and computer graphics (cs.GR). The proposed method involves training an autoencoder network and a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) simultaneously, which is a technique that is commonly used in deep learning (cs.LG, cs.AI). Finally, the paper focuses on the specific application of human face reconstruction, which is a topic that is often studied in multimedia (cs.MM) research.
